title: Marawila Bare Land
details:
Land Size 20 Acres
Electricity & Well Water
300+ Coconut Trees
2 Small Houses
2 Sides Cement Block wall /2 Sides barbed wire fence
Facing main road - 22 feet Tar Road (approved road size is 40 feet)
Land facing main road & beach front
Good for Hotel project/ Poultry farm
Clear Deed
Inspection can arrange with prior notice
Rs 140 Million (Negotiable)
